sentence.Network_en: I can't wait to see his crystal sarcophagus !
sentence.Network_cn: 我等不及想看到他的 水晶棺 了.

sentence.Network_en: The Hearst Castle in California houses the Nine Muses Sarcophagus , a 3 rd Century sculptural masterpiece.
sentence.Network_cn: 在加利福尼亚的赫斯特城堡的缪斯石棺, 九3世纪的雕塑的杰作.

sentence.Network_en: There are now stricter relationship requirements for Woohooing with Sims in the Sarcophagus.
sentence.Network_cn: 在石棺里嘿咻现在需要的关系条件更加严格.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这原是外教的私人墓地，满布安置石棺（sarcophagi）的壁龛（niches），墙上充满以原野景色为题材的美工壁画。三世纪时，这里开 …

list.abs: No.4 reactor by people with a huge sarcophagus sealed , this is a long process of Earthcore Tuisan .4号反应堆被人们用巨大的石棺密封起来，这是个漫长地核退散过程。
TYPE SPECIES)→A. sarcophagus 肉食阿尔伯脱龙其它种(
originally sarcophagus in the tomb is not open , because there is no protection of the environment , may damage the mummy inside the body .本来石棺是不能在墓室里打开的，因为没有保护环境，可能会损伤里面的木乃伊尸体。
...建立的名称，并发现这两个头颅骨与伤龙的模式种鹰爪伤龙有明显差异，因此将之建立为新属，肉食艾伯塔龙（Albertosaurus sarcophagus ）。但奥斯本并没有详述这些化石，而是根据赖博在前一年所写的完整叙述。这两个发现于亚伯达省的头颅骨，分别.
...一般恐龙名字的后缀。在新墨西哥州发现的阿尔伯托龙亚科头颅骨。这有可能是阿尔伯托龙。分类阿尔伯托龙是兽脚亚目暴龙科的成员。在这个科下，肉食阿尔伯托龙(Albertosaurus sarcophagus)与蛇发女怪龙(Gorgosaurus libratus)都是在阿尔伯托龙亚科之中。阿尔伯托龙亚科比强壮的暴龙亚科幼长。有指阿巴拉契亚龙亦是阿尔伯托龙亚科的成员，但却被受质疑。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Latin from Greek sarkophagos 'flesh-consuming', from sarx, sark- 'flesh' + -phagos '-eating'

entry.def: A sarcophagus is a large decorative container in which a dead body was placed in ancient times.

means.word_mean: 1. a stone coffin (usually bearing sculpture or inscriptions)

auth_sentence.content: Hard-to-swallow science fiction hokum about a mummy escaping from a sarcophagus.

auth_sentence.content: The rogue reactor still...discharging its radioactivity within its dense sarcophagus of concrete and steel.
